author: vmscode
content:
Hey everyone, I´ve searched a lot but couldn´t find the answer to this question: Can validators of zero knowledge proof rollups manipulate the order of transactions? How does that work? What prevents a validator from front running their users or implementing sandwich attacks?

If this isn´t the place to ask let me know and I will remove the post, would appreciate any resources or insight, thank you!

author: sky.cactus
content: It is the sequencers that have this power, and I don't believe there is any protection provided.

author: sky.cactus
content: Really, dapps should be trying to minimize front-running risk for their users.
